Name: Sera Antivirus: Smart Protection
Description: It provides a security shield to remove all viruses, malware, trojans, and other harmful software and applications from your device, and also offers storage management and Utilities services.

Name: Metrica - Performance Analytics
Description: Metrica is a modern, lightweight, and fully offline performance-analysing utility for Windows, designed to give you clear, visual insights into your system’s CPU and memory usage — without clutter, bloat, or distractions. Built with a clean UI and focused on usability, Metrica makes system monitoring feel intuitive, fast, and actually enjoyable.
